species.name: octillery
descriptions: It ensnares its foe with its suction- cupped tentacles before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, it spews ink to escape.
It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fellow OCTILLERY.
It lives in the gaps of boulders and in holes on the seafloor. Its suction cups grip prey tightly.
It loves to lurk inside holes in rocks. It sometimes sprays ink on prey by sticking out only its mouth.

abilities.name: suction-cups
abilities.effect: Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.

abilities.name: sniper
abilities.effect: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.

abilities.name: moody
abilities.effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.
